name: eNudata CMS
short_description:
eNudata CMS is an extensible, OO (Object Oriented), easy to use dynamic web content management system written in PHP. eNudata CMS is the ideal tool for developing small to large dynamic community websites, intra company portals, corporate portals, weblogs and much more.

eNudata CMS is based on Xoops 1.3.10, recoded, hacked, modded and/or changed to work on PHP 5+ and MySQL 5+. eNudata CMS come ready to deploy as a full Content Management System (CMS) including many modules.
summary: eNudata CMS is an easy to use content management system written in PHP
